name: Florence S. Narine
description:
Florence S. Narine, MBA is Senior Vice-President, Head of Canadian Institutional and Key Accounts. She is responsible for accelerating AGF’s Canadian institutional presence, while also growing key cross-functional and cross-jurisdictional client relationships across the firm.

Florence previously served as Senior Vice-President, Head of Product and Interim Head of Strategic Accounts Management, responsible for the overall strategic management of AGF products across all business lines, including product management and development, strategic market research, and planning and leading the launch of several innovative and successful products. In addition, she was responsible for building relationships with our strategic partners and leading our overall Strategic Accounts strategy.

Prior to joining AGF, Florence worked at CIBC Wood Gundy and Fidelity Canada. While at Fidelity, she served as Director, Product Solutions before joining the firm’s institutional efforts as Director, Institutional Investments.

Florence holds an Honours B.A. from the University of Toronto and earned an MBA from the University of Toronto's Rotman School of Management.
